alfredsnippet.snippet:
Check the diff against main/master, and remove all AI generated slop introduced in this branch.

This includes:
- Extra comments that a human wouldn't add or is inconsistent with the rest of the file (that's not to say no comments are useful, but only if the code is not particularly legible)
- Extra defensive checks or try/catch blocks (if going between a boundary, such as I/O , you should still make these checks)
- Casts to any to get around type issues
- Any other style that is inconsistent with the file
alfredsnippet.name: ailint
